enhancedtooltips.title: EnhancedTooltips Config
enhancedtooltips.config.rarityTooltip.de: Shows the rarity of an item in its tooltip.
enhancedtooltips.config.scaleFactor.desc: Adjusts the size of tooltips. A scale of 100% displays the tooltip at its default size.
enhancedtooltips.config.itemPreviewAnima: Toggles the item preview bouncing animation.
enhancedtooltips.config.itemBadges.desc: Shows the category of an item in a badge on its tooltip.
enhancedtooltips.config.borderColor.desc: Determines how the border color of tooltips be determined.
enhancedtooltips.config.hungerTooltip.de: Shows the maximum hunger which can be gained from an item in its tooltip.
enhancedtooltips.config.saturationToolti: Shows the maximum saturation which can be gained from an item in its tooltip.
enhancedtooltips.config.effectsTooltip.d: Shows a list of effects applied on consuming an item in its tooltip.
enhancedtooltips.config.rotationSpeed.de: The rotation speed of the model.
enhancedtooltips.config.armorTooltip.des: Shows a preview of the armor piece on an armor stand.
enhancedtooltips.config.horseArmorToolti: Shows a preview of the horse armor on a horse.
enhancedtooltips.config.wolfArmorTooltip: Shows a preview of the wolf armor on a wolf.
enhancedtooltips.config.bucketTooltip.de: Shows a preview of the bucket entity in a bucket.
Shows a preview of the spawn egg entity.
enhancedtooltips.config.mapTooltip.desc: Shows a preview of the filled map in its tooltip.
Shows a preview of the painting in its tooltip.
enhancedtooltips.config.durabilityToolti: Shows the durability of an item in its tooltip.
enhancedtooltips.config.durabilityBar.de: Shows the durability of an item, represented by a bar, in its tooltip.
enhancedtooltips.config.screen.warn: Â§cEnhancedTooltips is unable to display a configuration screen because YetAnotherConfigLib mod is not installed. Please use the configuration file instead. Sorry for the inconvenience!
